casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marian Olivia CURTIS 441P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2016 *683Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Timothy J. Rohr, Attorney at Law, Lenoir, for Curtis, Marian Olivia.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of December 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of December 2016."
